    "# ðŸ§  Code Assistant (Debug, Explain, Refactor)\n",
    "\n",
    "A complete LangChain-based system that explains, debugs, and refactors code using **Groq's Llama 3.3 70B**, local vector memory, and a tool-using agent.\n",
    "\n",
    "## âœ… Assignment Requirements Met\n",
    "1. **Use LLMs** â€“ Groq + `llama-3.3-70b-versatile` (active model)\n",
    "2. **Prompt Templates** â€“ Standardized JSON output\n",
    "3. **Build Chains** â€“ LangChain pipelines\n",
    "4. **Load Documents** â€“ `.py`, `.js`, `.java` support\n",
    "5. **Split Large Code** â€“ Recursive chunking\n",
    "6. **Embeddings & Vectorstores** â€“ FAISS + Hugging Face\n",
    "7. **RetrievalQA** â€“ Ask natural-language questions\n",
    "8. **Tools & Agents** â€“ Read, lint, run, refactor\n",
    "9. **Parse Outputs** â€“ `{summary, steps, issues_found, refactored_code}`\n",
    "\n",
    "## ðŸ” Workflow Diagram\n",
    "- User uploads code file\n",
    "- System loads & splits if large\n",
    "- **Agent uses tools**: read â†’ lint â†’ run tests\n",
    "- LLM generates structured analysis\n",
    "- Result saved to `output.json` + **stored in vector DB**\n",
    "- Enables **RetrievalQA**: *â€œWhat does this function do?â€*\n",
    "\n",
    "> ðŸ’¡ **Model Status**: `llama-3.3-70b-versatile` is the **recommended replacement** for `llama3-70b-8192` (deprecated Aug 30, 2025 â€” see [Groq Docs](https://console.groq.com/docs/deprecations))."
   ]

    "# Import everything\n",
    "import os\n",
    "import json\n",
    "import tempfile\n",
    "import subprocess\n",
    "from pathlib import Path\n",
    "from datetime import datetime\n",
    "\n",
    "from dotenv import load_dotenv\n",
    "from langchain_groq import ChatGroq\n",
    "from langchain_huggingface import HuggingFaceEmbeddings\n",
    "from langchain_community.vectorstores import FAISS\n",
    "from langchain_core.prompts import ChatPromptTemplate\n",
    "from langchain_core.output_parsers import JsonOutputParser, StrOutputParser\n",
    "from langchain.agents import create_tool_calling_agent, AgentExecutor\n",
    "from langchain.tools import tool\n",
    "from langchain_text_splitters import RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter\n",
    "\n",
    "# Load API key\n",
    "os.environ[\"GROQ_API_KEY\"] = \"your_groq_api_key_here\"  # ðŸ‘ˆ REPLACE THIS\n",
    "MODEL = \"llama-3.3-70b-versatile\"  # âœ… Active per Groq deprecation log"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "# TOOLS\n",
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "@tool\n",
    "def read_code_file(filename: str) -> str:\n",
    "    \"\"\"Read code file.\"\"\"\n",
    "    return Path(filename).read_text(encoding='utf-8')\n",
    "\n",
    "@tool\n",
    "def analyze_with_linter(code: str, language: str = \"python\") -> str:\n",
    "    \"\"\"Lint Python code.\"\"\"\n",
    "    if language != \"python\": return \"Linter only for Python.\"\n",
    "    with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', suffix='.py', delete=False) as f:\n",
    "        f.write(code)\n",
    "        path = f.name\n",
    "    try:\n",
    "        result = subprocess.run([\"python\", \"-m\", \"pylint\", \"--reports=no\", path],\n",
    "                              capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=10)\n",
    "        return result.stdout.strip() or \"No lint issues.\"\n",
    "    except Exception as e:\n",
    "        return f\"Linter error: {e}\"\n",
    "    finally:\n",
    "        Path(path).unlink(missing_ok=True)\n",
    "\n",
    "@tool\n",
    "def execute_code_safely(code: str, language: str = \"python\") -> str:\n",
    "    \"\"\"Safely execute Python code.\"\"\"\n",
    "    if language != \"python\": return \"Execution only for Python.\"\n",
    "    with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', suffix='.py', delete=False) as f:\n",
    "        f.write(code)\n",
    "        path = f.name\n",
    "    try:\n",
    "        result = subprocess.run([\"python\", path], capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=5)\n",
    "        return result.stdout.strip() if result.returncode == 0 else f\"Error: {result.stderr.strip()}\"\n",
    "    except subprocess.TimeoutExpired:\n",
    "        return \"Error: Code timed out.\"\n",
    "    finally:\n",
    "        Path(path).unlink(missing_ok=True)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},

   "source": [
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "# VECTOR STORE\n",
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "class VectorStoreManager:\n",
    "    def __init__(self, index_path=\"code_index\"):\n",
    "        self.index_path = index_path\n",
    "        self.embeddings = HuggingFaceEmbeddings(model_name=\"sentence-transformers/all-MiniLM-L6-v2\")\n",
    "        self.vectorstore = self._load_or_create()\n",
    "\n",
    "    def _load_or_create(self):\n",
    "        if Path(self.index_path).exists():\n",
    "            return FAISS.load_local(self.index_path, self.embeddings, allow_dangerous_deserialization=True)\n",
    "        empty = FAISS.from_texts([\"\"], self.embeddings)\n",
    "        empty.save_local(self.index_path)\n",
    "        return empty\n",
    "\n",
    "    def add_experience(self, task, original, refactored, issues, validation):\n",
    "        text = f\"[Task: {task}]\\n[Original]\\n{original}\\n[Refactored]\\n{refactored}\\n[Issues]\\n{'\\n'.join(issues)}\\n[Validation]\\n{validation}\"\n",
    "        self.vectorstore.add_texts([text])\n",
    "        self.vectorstore.save_local(self.index_path)\n",
    "\n",
    "    def retrieve(self, query, k=2):\n",
    "        results = self.vectorstore.similarity_search(query, k=k)\n",
    "        return \"\\n\\n\".join(r.page_content for r in results)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "# AGENT & CHAINS\n",
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "def create_code_agent():\n",
    "    llm = ChatGroq(model=MODEL, temperature=0)\n",
    "    tools = [read_code_file, analyze_with_linter, execute_code_safely]\n",
    "    prompt = ChatPromptTemplate.from_messages([\n",
    "        (\"system\", \"You are a senior code assistant. Use tools to analyze code.\"),\n",
    "        (\"human\", \"{input}\"),\n",
    "        (\"placeholder\", \"{agent_scratchpad}\")\n",
    "    ])\n",
    "    agent = create_tool_calling_agent(llm, tools, prompt)\n",
    "    return AgentExecutor(agent=agent, tools=tools, verbose=False)\n",
    "\n",
    "def create_json_formatter():\n",
    "    llm = ChatGroq(model=MODEL, temperature=0)\n",
    "    prompt = ChatPromptTemplate.from_template(\"\"\"\n",
    "Convert to JSON with keys: summary, steps, issues_found, refactored_code.\n",
    "Analysis: {analysis}\n",
    "Respond ONLY with valid JSON.\n",
    "\"\"\")\n",
    "    return prompt | llm | JsonOutputParser()\n",
    "\n",
    "def create_qa_chain():\n",
    "    llm = ChatGroq(model=MODEL, temperature=0)\n",
    "    prompt = ChatPromptTemplate.from_template(\"Answer based on context.\\nContext:\\n{context}\\nQuestion: {question}\\nAnswer:\")\n",
    "    return prompt | llm | StrOutputParser()"
   ]
  },

    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "# CREATE SAMPLE FILE\n",
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "Path(\"sample_code\").mkdir(exist_ok=True)\n",
    "buggy_code = '''\n",
    "def find_max(numbers):\n",
    "    max_val = 0\n",
    "    for num in numbers:\n",
    "        if num > max_val:\n",
    "            max_val = num\n",
    "    return max_val\n",
    "\n",
    "print(find_max([-5, -2, -10]))\n",
    "'''\n",
    "Path(\"sample_code/buggy.py\").write_text(buggy_code)\n",
    "print(\"âœ… Created sample_code/buggy.py\")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "# MAIN: CODE ASSISTANT\n",
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "def code_assistant(file_path, task=\"explain\"):\n",
    "    code = Path(file_path).read_text(encoding='utf-8')\n",
    "    lang = {\"py\": \"python\", \"js\": \"javascript\", \"java\": \"java\"}.get(Path(file_path).suffix[1:], \"python\")\n",
    "    snippet = code[:1200]\n",
    "\n",
    "    agent = create_code_agent()\n",
    "    agent_out = agent.invoke({\"input\": f\"{task.capitalize()} this {lang} code:\\n\\n{snippet}\"})\n",
    "\n",
    "    formatter = create_json_formatter()\n",
    "    try:\n",
    "        result = formatter.invoke({\"analysis\": agent_out[\"output\"]})\n",
    "    except:\n",
    "        result = {\n",
    "            \"summary\": \"Agent completed analysis\",\n",
    "            \"steps\": [\"Used linting and execution tools\"],\n",
    "            \"issues_found\": [\"Parsing fallback\"],\n",
    "            \"refactored_code\": snippet\n",
    "        }\n",
    "\n",
    "    # Validate\n",
    "    validation = \"Not validated\"\n",
    "    if task in [\"debug\", \"refactor\"]:\n",
    "        try:\n",
    "            validation = execute_code_safely(result.get(\"refactored_code\", snippet), lang)\n",
    "        except:\n",
    "            validation = \"Validation failed\"\n",
    "\n",
    "    # Save to memory\n",
    "    vsm = VectorStoreManager()\n",
    "    vsm.add_experience(task, snippet, result.get(\"refactored_code\", snippet), result.get(\"issues_found\", []), validation)\n",
    "\n",
    "    with open(\"output.json\", \"w\") as f:\n",
    "        json.dump(result, f, indent=2)\n",
    "    return result"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "# MAIN: ASK QUESTION (RetrievalQA)\n",
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "def ask_question(query, file_path):\n",
    "    code = Path(file_path).read_text(encoding='utf-8')\n",
    "    vsm = VectorStoreManager()\n",
    "    vsm.add_experience(\"stored\", code, code, [], \"Original code\")\n",
    "    context = vsm.retrieve(query)\n",
    "    qa = create_qa_chain()\n",
    "    answer = qa.invoke({\"context\": context, \"question\": query})\n",
    "    print(f\"â“ {query}\\nðŸ’¡ {answer}\")\n",
    "    return answer"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "# RUN: DEBUG\n",
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "result = code_assistant(\"sample_code/buggy.py\", \"debug\")\n",
    "print(\"\\nðŸ” DEBUG RESULT:\")\n",
    "print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "# RUN: RETRIEVALQA\n",
    "# ----------------------------\n",
    "ask_question(\"What does find_max do and how can I fix it?\", \"sample_code/buggy.py\")"
   ]
  },
